Description: MIJ, made in japan, Gibson, Lespaul, White, SG, Höfner, Duesenberg, Ibanez, ATELIER Z, ARIA, ESP, Caparison, Killer, COMBAT GUITARS, GUYATONE, Greco, Sugi Guitars, TEISCO, DEVISERA, Nil, Bacchus, VANZANDT, Fernandes, Fender Japan, Fujigen, MOON GUITARS, momose, Yairi Guitar, YAMAHA, TOKAI, Zemaitis, VOX, B, C, Rich, Epiphone, Gibson, Gretsch, Suhr, Schecter, Charvel, Jackson, Dean, Tom Anderson, Fender, Paul Reed Smith, Melancon, Mosrite, Rickenbacker, Robert Benedetto, Washburn, Ibanez, kramer, EDWARDS, Burny, Grassroots, 1980s Greco SS63-55 Deep joint / All Original The Mint Collection Very Good++ condition.Made in Japan Down from here, Photo is dent and scratches etc.. About scratches that are hard to see. To make it easy to understand the condition of the scratches, I lighted the light strongly. 1980s Greco SS63-55 Deep joint / All Original The Mint Collection Very Good++ condition.Made in Japan Body Mahogany. Neck Mahogany. Deep joint. Frets 22F. Scale 24.75inch (628mm) Gibson Scale. Nut Width About 1.69 inch (43mm). Pickup SCREAMIN x 2. Control 2 Volume, 2 Tone, 3-Way PU Toggle switch. Bridge Tune O Machic. Stop Tailpiece. Color Black. Weight About 6.53 Pound ( 2.96 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. There are scratches and dents. But fatal damage is not. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. This SS63-55 of black color is my first display. It was manufactured in the mid to late 1980's by Fujigen. It's the Mint Collection, most popular series in Greco. The Mint Collection, I feel Greco's policy very much. Accuracy of the product is high, It is deep joint. The Cherry color and White color is listed in the Greco's japanese catalog at that time. But the body of black color is not listed. Therefore, the Black body may be a Limited model. In Japanese used guitars market, it is rare to see. I can say that it is rare color model. The remaining amount of the Frets are many. You do not have to change the new frets for some time. " The High quality guitars at a Low price ". It is brand concept of Greco at the time. And current... It has became high price. 1980, Gibson filed a lawsuit. The cause is copyright issues. And more than anything, Greco's ( Fujigen's ) high degree of perfection. Perhaps Gibson had a feeling of crisis. I think this Greco is very good. Make of Greco (Fujigen) is very polite. Accuracy of the product is high. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. And, remaining amount of the Frets are many. Thanks to that, I feel easy to play the guitar. This Greco is Deep joint. Therefore Un pluged sound is very loud. You can feel vibrations transmitted to the body. The Pickups is original installed SCREAMIN. This SCREAMIN Pickup is excellence. And worldwide assessment is high. I feel the good Over drive and Distortion sound. The clean sound is also wonderful. Greco is Great !! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining Frets are 95% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. All Original.Note : The hard case key has been lost. Note : The Strap pin has been changed to lock type.
